title: Cameron Winklevoss: Buy BTC to Escape Negative Yield Bonds
text:
Cameron Winklevoss: Buy BTC to Escape Negative Yield Bonds

Cryptocurrency News 4 hours ago (Oct 17, 2019 04:41PM ET)

© Reuters. Cameron Winklevoss: Buy BTC to Escape Negative Yield Bonds (BTC) bull and co-founder of Gemini crypto exchange Cameron Winklevoss has noted that the volume of negative interest bonds accounts for $17 trillion and has urged the public to buy Bitcoin. In an Oct. 17 tweet. Winklevoss wrote: In a series of comments to the tweet, one of the users argued that “migrating this over to Bitcoin is a huge challenge,” to which Winklevoss asked which challenges they are referring to, further stating that it takes less than two minutes to open an account on a crypto exchange. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph

Cameron Winklevoss: Buy BTC to Escape Negative Yield Bonds
